Class.name: EasyCSP.Views.Site.Activate
Class.Description: This page is displayed when a new user successfully registers with the system. The page will contain a link to click to activate the new account. The user will not be allowed to log in until activation has been done.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
set ..pageTitle = "Pre-activation" do ..addContent("

Thank you for registering! You will receive an email shortly with a link to activate your account. Once your account is activated by clicking that link you will be able to log in.

")
